alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 04 at 2:06AM MST until May 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Including the cities of Fredonia, Jacob Lake, Grand Canyon Village, North Rim, Prescott, Seligman, Ash Fork, Flagstaff, Williams, Munds Park, Heber, Happy Jack, Forest Lakes, Show Low, Greer, and Pinetop. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains
